question: You read in a newspaper that a company is going torenovate some school buildings in your local area that are in apoor condition. You would like to offer your help.Write a letter to the charity paying for the renovation.In yourletter● explain why you want to help with the renovations● suggest what you can do to help● say when you are available to start work
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in your school buildings renovation project in my local area. I have found this information in my newspaper this morning and it would be a great honour for me if I can offer my help in your project.
Firstly, I work as a manager in Star renovation company and it has been over 10 years working with this firm so I have gained some good experience in the renovation department.

I can help your company in making new renovation designs and I can get you the best material that you can use for the renovations. I got a grip on making building structural designs and I hope my experience can be useful for your work.

Finally, I am available from the following week as I will be done with my meetings and I can give you my best time for this amazing project. I will provide you with my contact details when we talk next time. Please don’t hesitate to drop me a line if you need any more information from my end.
I hope to hear from you very soon.
